SEARCH
Package Retail_Operations

Class CashRegister

java.lang.Object
Retail_Operations.CashRegister
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonIdentifiable
public class CashRegister extends Object implements JsonIdentifiable
Overrides the `getJsonId()` method to generate a JSON-compatible ID for the product.
